summary: This bill, the Supporting all Healthy Options when Purchasing Produce Act of 2025 (SHOPP Act of 2025), aims to amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008. It focuses on expanding access to nutrition incentives under the Gus Schumacher Nutrition Incentive Program. Key changes include increasing year-round availability of incentives by including fresh frozen fruits and vegetables, and expanding the definition of eligible produce to include legumes.
